duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain vendor records and validate incoming vendor invoices
Process employee expense reports and prepare monthly credit card reconciliation
Prepare monthly balance sheet reconciliations and file monthly and quarterly Use Tax Return
Support month end and year end closing processes
Provide customer service and support to vendors and others with respect to various accounts payable and accounts receivable inquiries
Prepare Accounts Receivable invoices and follow up on aged receivables

education_certification.credential: B.S. degree in Accounting, Finance or Business Administration preferred, or a minimum of 3-4 years of hands-on accounting experience
